descriptionHtml:
Ver 0.4
"Barbarian Lv1" bug Fix.

While you were using the bow, many perks become useless.
This is the restriction which was being planned from the beginning.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now,you can get effective from many "One-Handed" & "Two-Handed" perks without limitation of equipment.
(But some of the "One-Handed" & "Two-Handed" perks are weakened because it is very over-powered.)


For example...

- You can get effective from "Bladesman" even if using battle-axe.

- You can get power from the perk "Juggernaut" without wearing heavy armors.

- Nor was that all, you can get the power from "Barbarian" and "Armsman" at the same time
as if you learned 2 kinds of perks.

So, you can use many kinds of battle-style in one charactor.


-Modified Perks-

Armsman & Barbarian
<Now,they are effective all melee weapons.>

Bladesman Hack and Slash Bone Breaker
Deep Wounds Limbsplitter Skullcrusher
<Now,you can get effect from these perks without using limited weapons.
But if you want to get perfect effect, you must use limited weapons yet.>


Dual Flurry & Dual Savagery
<Now,it is only limited by using shield.
So you can get effect from these perks to using craymore,battle-axe and warhammer.>



Fighting Stance Critical Charge Savage Strike
Paralyzing Strike Champion's Stance Devastating Blow
Great Critical Charge Sweep Warmaster
<Now,you can use the effectto using all melee weapons.
You can get the power from 2(or more) perks at the same time.>


Caution : This MOD only effective for Player-Charactor.
NPC don't get any effect from this MOD.
